## MapViewUtils.getCameraPositionFromTargetCoordinates() function

Returns the \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] of the camera, given its target coordinates on the map and its zoom, yaw and pitch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getCameraPositionFromTargetCoordinates(targetCoordinates: GeoCoordinates, distance: number, yawDeg: number, pitchDeg: number, projection: Projection, result?: THREE.Vector3): THREE.Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targetCoordinates | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | Coordinates of the center of the view. |
|  distance | number | Distance to the target in meters. |
|  yawDeg | number | Camera yaw in degrees. |
|  pitchDeg | number | Camera pitch in degrees. |
|  projection | [Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) | Active MapView, needed to get the camera fov and map projection. |
|  result | THREE.Vector3 | Optional output vector. |

<b>Returns:</b>

THREE.Vector3

Camera position in world space.
